name.en: well log interpretation for energy and new energy
name.ch: 井測於能源與新能源的應用

goal.ch: 本課程內容將介紹電纜井測的原理及其在岩性判別、岩石孔隙率、滲透率、孔隙含水飽和度等解釋與應用。學生將瞭解電纜井測的如何應用於油氣和地熱等的探勘。這門課程會培養實作的能力。
goal.en: This course introduces the principles of well logging and its application to the interpretation of lithology, porosity, permeability and water saturation. Students will learn how well logging can be applied to the exploration of oil and gas, and geothermal energy. The practical skills will be developed in this course.

outline.ch:
1. 課程簡介
2. 井眼環境簡介
3. 井測在岩性解釋的原理簡介
4. 井測在岩性解釋上的實務應用
5. 井測在孔隙率解釋的原理簡介
6. 井測在孔隙率解釋上的實務應用
7. 期中考(1)
8. 井測在岩石電性解釋的原理簡介
9. 井測在岩石電性解釋的實務應用
10. 井測在岩石水飽和率計算的原理簡介
11. 井測在岩石水飽和率計算的實務應用
12. 期中考(2)
13. 泥漿測錄簡介
14. 井測在油氣探勘的實務應用
15. 高階井測簡介
16. 井測在新能源探勘的實務應用(1)
17. 井測在新能源探勘的實務應用(1)
18. 期末考
outline.en:
1. Course overview
2. Borehole environment introduction
3. Lithology interpretation (principle)
4. Lithology interpretation (application)
5. Porosity interpretation (principle)
6. Porosity interpretation (application)
7. Mid-term (1)
8. Electrical property interpretation (principle)
9. Electrical property interpretation (application)
10. Water saturation (principle)
11. Water saturation (application)
12. Mid-term (2)
13. Mud logging (introduction)
14. Wireline-logging for oil and gas exploration (application)
15. Advanced wire-line logging tools (introduction)
16. Wireline-logging for new energy exploration (application)
17. Wireline-logging for new energy exploration (application)
18. Final-term

textbook.ch: 地球物理測井數據處理與綜合解釋，李舟波、潘保芝、范曉敏、莫修文，176頁
textbook.en: Basic well log analysis (second edition) by Malcolm H Rider, 280 pages.
